title: wine_Casina_di_Cornia_2011__Chianti_Classico

Unnamed: 0: 127295.
country: Italy.
description: Made from organically farmed grapes, this delicious 100% Sangiovese launches with an intense fragrance of wild cherry accompanied by whiffs of Mediterranean herbs and aromas that recall meat juices. The succulent black cherry flavors are accented with notes of white pepper, cinnamon and clove alongside polished tannins. It's well-balanced and surprisingly fresh for the vintage. Chartrand Imports, Savio Soares Selections, Natural Wine Company..
